member.name: CERT_LOGOTYPE_AUDIO
member.summary: The CERT_LOGOTYPE_AUDIO structure contains information about an audio logotype.

member.name: CERT_LOGOTYPE_AUDIO.LogotypeDetails
member.summary: A structure that contains additional information about the audio data.

member.name: CERT_LOGOTYPE_AUDIO.pLogotypeAudioInfo
member.summary: The address of a structure that contains the audio information.
